name: x-search-pro
description: Chrome extension with smart X/Twitter searches that auto-update their time ranges

scripts.test:e2e:sharded: HEADLESS=true npx playwright test --project=e2e --shard=1/3 & HEADLESS=true npx playwright test --project=e2e --shard=2/3 & HEADLESS=true npx playwright test --project=e2e --shard=3/3 & wait
scripts.validate:pre-push: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build:zip: zip -r x-search-pro.zip manifest.json popup/ content/ background/ lib/ assets/ LICENSE PRIVACY_POLICY.md -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*/.DS_Store' -x '*.git/*' -x 'node_modules/*' -x 'tests/*' -x '*.log' -x 'plans/*' -x 'logos/*' -x '.husky/*' -x 'STORE_LISTING.md' -x 'CHANGELOG.md'

author: neonwatty
